LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWindTurbine.label: advanced wind turbine
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWindTurbine.description: A spacertech, advanced wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedSolarGenerator.label: advanced solar generator
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedSolarGenerator.description: This spacertech solar generator is capable of extracting significantly more energy from sunlight. Does not work in the dark or under artificial light.
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWatermillGenerator.label: advanced watermill generator
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWatermillGenerator.descripti: A spacertech building that produces electricity from a river. Must be placed with its wheel in moving water. If watermills are placed too close together, the turbulence they generate will interfere and reduce power generation.
LanguageData.VPE_AdvancedGeothermalGenerator.label: advanced geothermal generator
LanguageData.VPE_AdvancedGeothermalGenerator.descript: This advanced, spacertech generator produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a steam geyser.
